import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { User } from 'src/app/interfaces';
import { TokenService } from 'src/app/services/token.service';
import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service';
import Swal from 'sweetalert2';
import { Router } from '@angular/router';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-navfooter',
  templateUrl: './navfooter.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./navfooter.component.scss']
})
export class NavfooterComponent implements OnInit {

  constructor(private userService:UserService, private tokenService:TokenService, private router:Router) { }

  public user: User;
  public userId: string;

  ngOnInit(): void {
    this.findUser();
  }



  findUser() {
    this.userId = localStorage.getItem('user');
    this.userService.findUserById(this.userId).subscribe(res => {
      this.user = res.user;
    });
  }

  logout() {
    this.tokenService.logout();
  }

  checkIfLoggedOrNot() {
    if (!localStorage.getItem('user')) {
      Swal.fire("You must be logged in to access the forum");


    } else {
      this.router.navigateByUrl("forum");
    }
  }
}

<div class="d-xs-block d-sm-block d-md-none fixed-bottom">
    <ul class="nav nav-pills nav-fill">
        <li class="nav-item" routerLinkActive="active">
            <a class="nav-link" routerLink="/home"><i class="fas fa-home"></i></a>
        </li>

        <li class="nav-item" routerLinkActive="active">
            <a class="nav-link" routerLink="/anime"><i class="fas fa-tv"></i></a>
        </li>

        <li class="nav-item" routerLinkActive="active">
            <a class="nav-link" routerLink="/manga"><i class="fas fa-book-open"></i></a>
        </li>

        <li class="nav-item" routerLinkActive="active">
            <a class="nav-link" (click)="checkIfLoggedOrNot()"><i class="far fa-comments"></i></a>
        </li>

        <li *ngIf="user" class="nav-item" routerLinkActive="active">
            <div class="btn-group dropup">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-none dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown"
                    aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false">
                    <i class="far fa-user prof"></i>
                </button>
                <div class="dropdown-menu">
                    <a class="dropdown-item" routerLink="/profile"> <i class="far fa-user mr-2"></i>Profile</a>
                    <a class="dropdown-item drop" (click)="logout()"><i class="fas fa-sign-out-alt mr-2"></i>Logout</a>
                </div>
            </div>
        </li>

        <li *ngIf="!user" class="nav-item">
            <a class="nav-link" routerLink="/signin"><i class="fas fa-sign-in-alt"></i></a>
        </li>
        <li *ngIf="!user" class="nav-item">
            <a class="nav-link" routerLink="/signup"><i class="fas fa-sign-out-alt"></i></a>
        </li>
    </ul>
</div>
